item.title: Top News Coforge Limited Allots 1,45,189 Shares Under ESOP Scheme, Paid-Up Capital Rises to ₹67.01 Crores 10 hours ago Coforge Limited has allotted 1,45,189 equity shares under its ESOP 2005 scheme on December 14, 2025, with each share having a face value of ₹2.00. This allotment has increased the company's total paid-up share capital to 33,50,41,808 equity shares, aggregating to ₹67,00,83,616. The company is completing formalities for listing and trading of these shares on stock exchanges.
item.description: Top News Coforge Limited Allots 1,45,189 Shares Under ESOP Scheme, Paid-Up Capital Rises to ₹67.01 Crores 10 hours ago Coforge Limited has allotted 1,45,189 equity shares under its ESOP 2005 scheme on December 14, 2025, with each share having a face value of ₹2.00. This allotment has increased the company's total paid-up share capital to 33,50,41,808 equity shares, aggregating to ₹67,00,83,616. The company is completing formalities for listing and trading of these shares on stock exchanges.

item.title: Jagsonpal Services Gets Approval to Shift Office from Delhi to Maharashtra 3 hours ago Jagsonpal Services Limited has obtained regulatory approval to move its registered office from Delhi to Maharashtra. The Regional Director granted approval on December 13, 2025, following the company's application via form INC-23 with SRN AB8553582. The company will proceed with filing necessary forms with the Registrar of Companies upon receiving the certified true copy of the order.
item.description: Jagsonpal Services Gets Approval to Shift Office from Delhi to Maharashtra 3 hours ago Jagsonpal Services Limited has obtained regulatory approval to move its registered office from Delhi to Maharashtra. The Regional Director granted approval on December 13, 2025, following the company's application via form INC-23 with SRN AB8553582. The company will proceed with filing necessary forms with the Registrar of Companies upon receiving the certified true copy of the order.

item.title: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Climb Over 0.5% in Positive Close 2 days ago Indian markets closed positively on December 12, with Nifty 50 breaching 26,000 and Sensex surpassing 85,000. The session saw a broad-based rally with 61% of traded stocks advancing. InterGlobe Aviation clarified no SEBI investigation and disclosed a CGST penalty. Infosys witnessed significant promoter share sales.
item.description: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Climb Over 0.5% in Positive Close 2 days ago Indian markets closed positively on December 12, with Nifty 50 breaching 26,000 and Sensex surpassing 85,000. The session saw a broad-based rally with 61% of traded stocks advancing. InterGlobe Aviation clarified no SEBI investigation and disclosed a CGST penalty. Infosys witnessed significant promoter share sales.

item.title: Ashiana Ispat Reports Q1 FY26 Loss Despite Revenue Growth of ₹8,721 Crores 1 day ago Ashiana Ispat Limited posted a net loss of ₹35.33 crores for Q1 FY26 despite generating revenue of ₹8,721.44 crores through its new asset-light business model. The company faces auditor qualifications regarding statutory dues and going concern issues, multiple legal proceedings including NCLT petitions and trademark disputes, while successfully settling ₹4,310 lakhs with SBI.
item.description: Ashiana Ispat Reports Q1 FY26 Loss Despite Revenue Growth of ₹8,721 Crores 1 day ago Ashiana Ispat Limited posted a net loss of ₹35.33 crores for Q1 FY26 despite generating revenue of ₹8,721.44 crores through its new asset-light business model. The company faces auditor qualifications regarding statutory dues and going concern issues, multiple legal proceedings including NCLT petitions and trademark disputes, while successfully settling ₹4,310 lakhs with SBI.
